sentences.english: Be the day lily among grass. Do not be the cuckoo among the birds.
sentences.chinese: 當爲花中之萱草，毋爲鳥中之杜鵑。

sentences.english: Plants of Hemerocallis esculenta in Shennongjia mount in northwestern Hubei have long been identified as H. fulva in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 產自鄂西北神農架的北萱草植物一直被誤定爲萱草。

sentences.english: Plants of Hemerocallis esculenta in Shennongjia mount in northwestern Hubei have long been identified as H. fulva in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 產自鄂西北神農架的北萱草植物一直被誤定爲萱草。

sentences.english: And it also had some effect in winter that was the suitable local plant to be used through the year.
sentences.chinese: 因此萱草是杭州地區較爲適宜的淨水植物。

sentences.english: In China, the flower for mother is day lily, also known as Nepenthe.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，給母親的花通常是萱草花，也叫做忘憂草。

definition: common mallow (Malva sinesis), used in TCM
Chinese peony (Paeonia lactiflora)/common herbaceous peony/peony used in TCM
yellow flower (cosmetic powder used on women's forehead in former times)
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
